item.title: Second Pelican attempt: creating a blog on GitHub with Pelican
item.description: How to create a blog with GitHub and Pelican (Python) Suppose that you are curios about GitHub pages… but I don’t understand their guide. And suppose that you don’t like Ruby but prefer Python… First of all create a repo named youname.github.com on your GitHub account (ok, maybe, before this, you have to create a GitHub account!). Then set the remote origin locally with # I use ssh because I can log in without a password saving my key at https://github.
